sense.def:
To dismiss something
pomeni skleniti ali reči, da nekaj ni dovolj pomembno ali dobro, da bi o tistem razmišljali.

seg.quote: This plan was dismissed as foolish.

sense.def:
To be dismissed from a job
pomeni, da se je tistega človeka delodajalec znebil.

seg.quote: They were dismissed for refusing to join a union.
Dismissing the other children, she told me to wait.
